name: BEE Chaos
description:
Bee the hero

Infiltrate the wasp hive and cause chaos without raising the alarm. You are armed with only your wings, your wits, a limited use stinger, and a timed pheromone spray which makes the wasps temporarily perceive you as a member of the hive. Happy hunting!

Win Conditions

Enter the hive and destroy as many honeycomb, larvae, or wasps as you can. The chaos you cause is measured on the purple bar. When a wasp spots you, the hive alert increases shown in the orange sphere. If the alert fills to maximum, you lose.

Exit the hive from the same location you entered after causing any amount of chaos to win. Your total Chaos score and time spent will be shown. Post your best runs in comments below.

Causing Chaos

Each attack on honeycomb or larvae causes a small amount of chaos. Attack them multiple times to destroy them. As the next generation of wasps, larvae are the more valuable target but are also more heavily guarded.

In your journey, you may encounter nectar and hotdogs which help replenish your skills. 

Known Issues
  • Intermittent stuck moving up on interaction. To fix, stop moving and tap up [ W ].
